resources.string: This is a simple app to fix Poweramp\'s lack of local LRC lyrics support. Before we start, some permissions are required to work correctly. \nAfter permissions are granted, a configuration page will appear.
Your Android version does not require any permission to be requested.
All permissions are ready, click next to make customizations!
Storage permission(read only) is required to fetch your .lrc files.
Drawing over other apps is required to create a floating lyric window.
All ready! Open Poweramp, start playing, click the notification and enjoy!

Note: \nWhen lyrics delay, try pausing and resuming playing. Delay caused by Poweramp may also be the cause, as Poweramp reports position in seconds, thus when the lyrics change too often or are at the middle of a second there will unavoidably exist delay. If you believe what you meet is a bug, please open a issue attached with procedures to reproduce the bug and delay caused by Poweramp on GitHub.
Running in the background (this notification can be disabled).
(Android 10 only) May be useful if normal version is not working, but please also report when that happens
Possibly fix problem of garbled lyrics downloaded from QQ music
Generate a detailed log of what might cause problems (not including personal information)
Things won\'t get changed until app restarts.
Things won\'t get changed until lyrics reload.
